Total cost of MBBS in Ukraine, affordable fees and high-quality Medical Education, duration of MBBS in Ukraine, & admission to MBBS in Ukraine.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/how-to-apply-mbbs-in-ukraine", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "How to Apply MBBS in Ukraine?", }, }, }; return (

How to Apply MBBS in Ukraine?

  • How much cost for MBBS in Ukraine
  • How to Apply MBBS in Ukraine
  • Why MBBS Cheap in Ukraine?
  • How many years to complete MBBS in Ukraine
  • Is doing MBBS in Ukraine Good?
  • Conclusion

MBBS in Ukraine is the best option for Indian students to pursue low-cost medical education. Ukraine has various top Medical Universities that provide MBBS, MD and other degrees in medicine at an affordable fee. Studying MBBS in Ukraine make the students familiar with theoretical and practical knowledge in Medicine.

The students are awarded the degree as MD Physician after completing MBBS in Ukraine. The degree is equivalent to MBBS in India according to the MCI. There is no requirement to give any entrance test to take admission in Ukraine Medical University.

{/* */}

How much cost for MBBS in Ukraine

The cost of MBBS in Ukraine is very low. Here are the top Ukraine medical universities that provide MBBS course at an affordable fee:

University Tuition Fees Per Year in Rs
Bogomolets National Medical University 3,15,000
Bukovinian State Medical University 2,82,000
Danylo Halytsky Lviv National Medical University 4,20,000
Dnipropetrovsk State Medical Academy 2,94,840
Ivano Frankivsk National Medical University 2,80,000
Kharkiv National Medical University 3,30,000
Kyiv Medical University 4,02,000
Petro Mohyla Black Sea National University 2,59,000
Lugansk State Medical University 2,80,000
Odessa National Medical University 4,20,000
Ternopil State Medical University 3,08,000
Uzhhorod National Medical University 2,45,000
Zaporozhye State Medical University 2,52,000
Vinnitsa National Medical University 3,50,000
Poltava State Medical University 2,66,000
V.N.Karazin Kharkiv National Medical University 3,85,468
Taras Shevchenko National University 2,59,000
Sumy State University 3,01,000

How to Apply MBBS in Ukraine

The admission process of Ukraine medical colleges is very simple. You do not need to qualify for any other exams to pursue MBBS in Ukraine. You need to have NEET scorecard to take admission in the college. You need to follow the below steps to apply MBBS in Ukraine:

  • You need to fill up the online form of the Ukraine medical college which is available on the official website of the college.
  • You need to pay the online amount for the online admission form.
  • You will get the offer letter from Ukraine Medical College to study MBBS.
  • Once receive the offer letter from the university, you will get some time to pay for the first-semester course fee.
  • You can apply for a student visa after paying the MBBS fee.
  • Once you receive the visa, you can fly to Ukraine and start your MBBS in Ukraine.

Why MBBS Cheap in Ukraine?

Pursuing MBBS from Ukraine is getting very popular as Ukraine has a high number of the state governed MBBS Universities. Most of the international students prefer Ukraine to study MBBS because of world-best medical universities and the tuition fee of MBBS in Ukraine is very low and inexpensive as compared to other countries. Medical education is highly subsidized by the Government of Ukraine.

Ukraine Medical Universities are accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science and Ministry of Healthcare of Ukraine and the universities are listed in the World Medical Schools of the World Health Organization. Every year, a large number of students take admission to study MBBS in Ukraine. The living cost in Ukraine is also cheap with a healthy environment.

How many years to complete MBBS in Ukraine

The complete duration of MBBS in Ukraine is 5.8 years that describes as 5 years of MBBS course and 1 year of an internship program. There is no requirement to clear any entrance exam to take admission in Ukraine medical university. The most popular medical fields of MBBS in the Ukraine medical universities are listed below:

  • General medicine
  • Pediatrics
  • Pharmacy
  • Dentistry
  • Surgery
Is doing MBBS in Ukraine Good?

Studying MBBS in Ukraine is the best option because it comprises of various world-class Government Medical Universities that offer MBBS, MD, and other degrees in medicine at a very affordable fee. The students that complete their MBBS from Ukraine medical university are eligible to apply for a job in any part of the world. After completing MBBS course from Ukraine, the students can also practice in India if they qualify MCI screening test.

Ukraine medical universities are recognized by WHO, UNESCO, MCI, and medical councils of many other countries. The medium of instruction in Ukraine is English which makes it much easier for the students to adapt to the environment. The cost of accommodation in Ukraine is very low as compared to other countries The Ukraine medical colleges provide high-quality facilities to the students.

Conclusion

Indian students that complete MBBS from Ukraine Medical University can easily get a job in India as the MBBS degree obtained from a Ukraine University is recognized by the MCI. There are plenty of job opportunities are available in Ukraine for MBBS doctors. Studying MBBS in Ukraine is beneficial for every international student around the world and especially for Indian students.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience. He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget. ✔3500+ Students ✔15 Countries ✔MBBS, MBA, PG, UG ✔100% Commitment ✔Education Loan ✔Job Placements
